Package de.feu.massim22.group3.agents

Class Agent

java.lang.Object
de.feu.massim22.group3.agents.Agent
Direct Known Subclasses:
BdiAgent
public abstract class Agent extends Object
An abstract Java agent.
Author:
massim team, Heinz Stadler (minor contribution)

  • Constructor Details

    • Agent

      Agent(String name, MailService mailbox)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      name - the agent's name
      mailbox - the mail facility

  • Method Details

    • handlePercept

      public abstract void handlePercept(eis.iilang.Percept percept)
      Handles a percept. This method is used only if the EIS is configured to handle percepts as notifications.
      Parameters:
      percept - the percept to process

    • step

      public abstract eis.iilang.Action step()
      Called for each step.
      Returns:
      the action which should be send to the server

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns:
      the name of the agent

    • sendMessage

      protected void sendMessage(eis.iilang.Percept message, String receiver, String sender)
      Sends a percept as a message to the given agent. The receiver agent may fetch the message the next time it is stepped.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to deliver
      receiver - the receiving agent
      sender - the agent sending the message

    • broadcast

      void broadcast(eis.iilang.Percept message, String sender)
      Broadcasts a message to the entire team.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to broadcast
      sender - the agent sending the message

    • handleMessage

      public abstract void handleMessage(eis.iilang.Percept message, String sender)
      Called if another agent sent a message to this agent; so technically this is part of another agent's step method.
      Parameters:
      message - the message that was sent
      sender - name of the agent who sent the message

    • setPercepts

      public void setPercepts(List<eis.iilang.Percept> addList, List<eis.iilang.Percept> delList)
      Sets the percepts for this agent. Should only be called from the outside.
      Parameters:
      addList - the new percepts for this agent.
      delList - the now invalid percepts for this agent.

    • say

      void say(String message)
      Prints a message to std out prefixed with the agent's name.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to say

    • getPercepts

      List<eis.iilang.Percept> getPercepts()
      Returns a list of this agent's percepts. Percepts are set by the scheduler each time before the step() method is called. Percepts are cleared before each step, so relevant information needs to be stored somewhere else by the agent.
      Returns:
      a list of all new percepts for the current step
